TopicTitle: Help with downloading KerbalX craft files

Articles.Content: This is my first time going on KerbalX to download craft files. KerbalX only gives you the .craft files, and not the .loadmeta files. Is the loadmeta file needed to load a craft in KSP, or will a loadmeta file be generated automatically after the vessel is loaded in KSP?

12 minutes ago, WarpPrime said:

This is my first time going on KerbalX to download craft files. KerbalX only gives you the .craft files, and not the .loadmeta files. Is the loadmeta file needed to load a craft in KSP, or will a loadmeta file be generated automatically after the vessel is loaded in KSP?

You don't need the loadmeta.
the loadmeta is generated when you open the craft in the VAB/SPH (i think)
